name: When Day Breaks SCP Fan Game
name_original: When Day Breaks SCP Fan Game
description:
Enter in the apocalyptic world of 2019, as Agent Frost. Fighting through multiple enemies around every corner of this platformer! Along with it's obstacles standing in your way to get back to base! Based on the SCP Short Story by ShaggyDredlocks Inspired by other platformers such as Metriod and Cuphead. 

Features Include:

A variety of enemies to interact with.

Multiple levels with  progression through the game.

Obstacles to challenge the player.

A laser that can blast through enemies.

A gate that can proceed through each level of the game.

7 levels of gameplay. 

Game is free!
